description.p: Dragon-Kin are humanoids who carry draconic blood not as a distant echo, but as a living inheritance. Unlike dragonborn, whose lineage manifests uniformly, Dragon-Kin display their heritage in varied and personal ways—through antler-like horns, patches of shimmering scales, and tails that move with deliberate balance.

Their draconic ancestry is ancient rather than immediate. At some point deep within their lineage, a dragon became bound to a mortal bloodline through means long lost to history. Once established, this inheritance does not fade or dilute over generations. A Dragon-Kin family remains draconic indefinitely, which is both the source of their power and the reason for their rarity.
Though uncommon, Dragon-Kin often integrate seamlessly into the cultures they inhabit, identifying more with the societies that raised them than with any unified Dragon-Kin culture.
Your Dragon-Kin character has the following racial traits.
Ability Score Increase. Increase two different ability scores of your choice by 1.
Size. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your walking speed is 30 feet.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.
Darkvision. You have darkvision out to 30 feet. In addition, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
Draconic Will. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
Cultural Adaptation. You gain proficiency with one tool of your choice, or you learn one additional language of your choice.
Draconic Insight. You gain proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: Perception, Nature, Survival, or Insight.
Draconic Expression. Choose one: Great Wings, Draconic Magic, or Great Horns.
Draconic Color. Choose one draconic color. This determines your draconic damage type and influences your temperament.

You can manifest your wings to gain a flying speed of 30 feet for a total of 10 minutes per day. These minutes can be used all at once or in shorter increments (no action required). You regain expended minutes when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: Fly speed 30 ft for up to 10 minutes per long rest (track minutes spent).

description.p: As an action, you release a pulse of draconic energy in a 15-foot radius centered on yourself. Each creature of your choice in the area takes 2d4 damage (type = your Draconic Color). Uses: 2 per short rest. Damage increases by 1d4 at 5th, 10th, and 15th level.

sheet.description: Action: 15-ft radius pulse; 2d4 damage (your draconic damage type). +1d4 at 5th/10th/15th. Uses: 2/short rest.

description.p: Reaction: gain the benefits of absorb elements. Uses: 2 per long rest.

sheet.description: Reaction: gain the benefits of absorb elements when you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.
